t=int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
	n=int(raw_input())
	x,y,z=raw_input().split();
	xyz=x+y+z
	l=[]
	for i in range(1,10):
		for j in range(0,10):
			if int(str(i)+xyz+str(j))%n==0:
				l.append(int(str(i)+xyz+str(j)))
	if len(l)==0:
		print 0
	else:
		ans=str(max(l))
		print ans[0],ans[4],(int(ans))/n
